projects.title: Data Science Mini Projects Collection
projects.description: A curated collection of data science mini projects showcasing skills in data exploration, machine learning, visualization, and analysis using Python, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, and more. Each project includes clean code and well-documented Jupyter notebooks.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A pastel-themed responsive weather app that fetches real-time weather data using OpenWeatherMap API. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this project focuses on UI design and API integration.

projects.title: End-to-End Churn Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Complete customer churn analysis pipeline using SQL Server for ETL, Power BI for interactive dashboards, and Python Random Forest for predictive modeling. Features demographic analysis, churn pattern identification, and ML-powered customer retention insights.
